content:
I've successfully been running the development version of zulip with FreeIPA for two years.

I now wanted to use the "deactivated": "nsAccountLock" functionality described in the documentation but hit a problem when trying to sync the user accounts using the cronjob.

It seems the key "nsAccountLock" (required for FreeIPA) is turned lower-case for the LDAP query, breaking the synchronisation:

Posting here for visibility; see #23430 for details.
@Mateusz Mandera you're probably the best person to help debug this.
